VIII.iv.4.B.6.f
.
SMC Under PL 98-223
PL 98-223
, effective October 1, 1983, provided for payment of SMC under
38 U.S.C. 1114(o)
to include bilateral blindness, having LPO or less, with
SC total deafness in one ear, or
bilateral hearing loss, rated 40 percent or more disabling, with SC hearing impairment in at least one ear.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section B - History of Special Monthly Compensation (SMC)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section B
